website_summaries.verdict: Allows even those with thin hair to attain magazine-ready hair quickly and easily.
pros: We love that this spray succeeds in providing women and men with big hair results
Get thick hair that can be easily styled
cons: May need to respray as hair may go flat

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I’m suffering from an old lady syndrome....limp, thinning hair. I bought Boldify before i headed to a hair emergency room. It’s perfect. My hair is volumized and not gunky or stiff. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Granger

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 71-year-old and have very fine thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Just used it and will never shampoo again without it! I'm a 71-year-old and have very fine thin hair. scalp showing all over my head and look almost bald on the front top. I dried my hair with a hair dryer after spraying my hair with Boldify, then ran a comb through what felt like more than twice the amount of hair than the last time I combed it. The texture feels clean, soft and smooth. Thank you Boldify!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific! I have thinning, straight hair. I used this product once and it made my hair look and feel thicker! I do NOT have any affiliation with this product. This is my own testimony. Also, I'm allergic to many "thickening" products but I had not hives/rashes with BOLDIFY! I highly recommend this product to any person who wants their thinning hair to look fuller!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have an undercut and I have Asian hair which means it is stiff, goes flat and not workable after it drys. This product gave my hair a much needed lift and stays in place after using hairdryer. It is a little sticky like what others have claimed but I like it because it stays the shape I need and with a little clay and hairspray, my hair stays in place and doesn't loose its shape throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great spray!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is awesome! It smells really nice, the mist is extremely fine, and the results are amazing. It volumizes just enough to look good and lasts all day. I have tried a few other sprays in the past and many of them leave me with the hard hairspray texture. This one keeps my hair soft while thickening at the same time. I will definitely repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great volume effect if YOU TIME IT RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This stuff honestly makes me feel a lot better when I leave my apartment for the day due to my thinning hair. I will say however, that timing is key. When the bottle says 'slightly damp hair', it really mean SLIGHTLY damp. Put it on too soon, and your hair just kind of gets dense and oily looking. Too late, and it's hard to distribute. You really have to wait till your hair is just slightly still damp and THEN put it on. If you do that, it really will work wonders. Trial and error on your part will give you the best timing for your own hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G.

customer_reviews.title: I am sure alot of the reviews are biased because ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sure alot of the reviews are biased because when the product arrives you get a free offer. Nothing spectacular about it. Did not notice a significant difference on my hair. I dont care about the free offer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Uses thia morning. Could not get brush through hair to style. Gunky residue. Hairdresser had to professionally clarify my hair and not all product washed out. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair thicker and fuller
customer_reviews.text: This product made my limp thinning hair much, much fuller. I can do anything with my hair now!
customer_reviews.author: LADY

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty sure that these products do what they say they ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that I have tried this and other Boldify varieties and it is not affective on my hair. It is probably not the product but my hair especially recently has become extremely soft. My hair is just problematic so I can not say these products helped at all. Really, I am pretty sure that these products do what they say they do, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: linda perez

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Fine Thin Hair !
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair and this product works perfectly. Not sticky or heavy, just makes my hair appear thicker !
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: "Weightless, but powerful"
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair. Being a female, that is not easy to hide. I've tried shampoo treatments, prescriptions, serums and my hair is still fly away and baby fine. Boldify ads a layer of thickness without being sticky or making my hair look dull. I can go from fly away to manageable with just a spray. My hair still has texture hours later. This is my third bottle, it is now a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Face

customer_reviews.title: Hair felt like straw
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my hair feel like straw. I couldn't even run my fingers through it. The instructions say to spray it all over your hair but this is really more of a root lifter and shouldn't be applied all over. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: doglover813

customer_reviews.title: Baby Fine Hair - Was a No Go
customer_reviews.text: Based on the positive reviews, I hoped Boldify was the answer to my limp, baby fine hair. It did provide lasting non sticky volume but at the cost of drying my hair out, giving it a "straw like/fried" feel. I'm guessing here, but I think the heavy dose of sea salt" [#4 in ingredients list] on baby fine hair was the culprit. From the high percentage of positive reviews, I'm sure this product works well on other types of hair just not mine, am returning it. I gave this 3 stars due to the company's return guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Donna OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief from the stress of thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Came from one of the "peoeple who bought this also bought this" links. We love this product. The hair thickening fibre is truly amazing. No it doesn't regrow hair but it does have an immediate cosmetic effect that will bring tears to your eyes. Hair loss is traumatic for anyone but for a young woman it can be devastating, this product has boosted self confidence within minutes. I am not compensated for anything, my gushing is real. If you are dealing with thinning hair, you really need to try it. I have no idea how the color matched to others but we nailed it on the first try. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: BenZoh

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Usually, when I flat iron my hair it doesn't have any body to it, but when I use Boldify, I get that body I want! My sister walked past me on Thanksgiving and just ran her fingers through my hair & said, "Your hair feels really thick!" So I told her about this spray :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: From limp and lame to fill and fab
customer_reviews.text: I have the finest hair in the world. Seriously, a beauty school had samples of my hair to show their students. It also happens to be VERY straight and never holds any curl I put in it. I finally gave up the long hair and got the "I'd like to speak to your manager" haircut. It needs some body to make it look good. This stuff is awesome. My hair still feels good and yet it is fuller and looks so good! I'm officially a lifetime user!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: I was seriously disappointed. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry, as this company seems to be sensitive to animal cruelty. But how about people rip off? A bottle of really cheap and watered down hair conditioner will give you the same results. I was seriously disappointed. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. James M. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Its like sticky, drying spray starch
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Dried my hair out terribly and was impossible to comb through. It also is very dulling. It has salt water which just does not work. Unfortunately, it was the holidays and I didn't get it returned in time. It will make your hair feel like straw and be just as impossible to comb so it pulls out a lot of hair as well. Too pricey for "beach hair."
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gervais

customer_reviews.title: Really does turn up the volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Out of New Zealand and made in America. If you're suffering from thinning hair, you'll get thickness and volume that looks natural and will last 24 hours until your next shampoo. A few sprays will create an amazing transformation. It really lifts up limp hair and allows for creative styling. This definitely belongs in your arsenal. The company also claims that the product is American crafted in an FDA approved lab without parabens, alcohol or sulfates and not tested on animals. Some reviewers have cast suspicion on a few of the ingredient, but the company claims they're within FDA safe regulations. A personal care product that actually works...that really is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. This just arrived. I used it once. Made my hair feel like straw and just gross feeling. It couldn't even style..just hung flat. It made my scalp feel bad. I had to take a shower to wash it out. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Soft, non-sticky, fullness
customer_reviews.text: I like that my hair doesn't feel sticky. And it stats soft and full looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Not A Miracle But A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a miracle because I'm losing my hair and although I didn't get my miracle this product is good and does make hair seem more dense. If you have thin or fine hair or are just beginning to lose your hair, you'd probably really like this product. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly works just as advertised! I’ve been using Boldify for several months, and I continue to love my new Boldify hair! It adds so much more volume and body to my thin fine hair! Wish it came in larger bottles. I will certainly keep using Boldify!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have very fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very fine hair, always have. So I look for products that make my hair seem fuller. This spray works well to do this. I spray it on my hair after showering and then blow it dry. I also put a little more on after blow drying my hair. It won't regrow your hair or anything magical like that, BUT it works very well to add volume and thickness to fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pekkybrown

customer_reviews.title: No body!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very fine & thin...saw no difference & returned it...SORRY, WAS HOPING IT WOULD MAKE MY HAIR HAVE SOME BODY, BUT IT DIDN'T.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Drying causes breaking....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 3 times for my fine hair. It did make it do as advertised, big problem is the drying effect which has caused my hair to break off badly. Thaught it was falling out but dermotoligest made it clear that treatment is needed to try and stop the breakage. this has been devastating to me. I followed the instructions completely. Be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dorothy Chage my rating to a two star

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fine and/or Thinning Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time finding products that don't weigh my hair down. My first bottle of Boldify arrived during an extremely hot and humid weather week, and this product did not disappoint. My hair soaked up the moisture in the air, yet retained its volume and looked noticeably thicker. I used minimal cover-up (hair fibers/spray) on my usually obvious thinning areas. Not only will the bottle of Boldify that I purchased last longer than the mousse product I'd been using, but I will also save money and time by using less additional cover-up products. After I exhaust my current supply of auburn fibers, I will order the Boldify brand of those as well. Enthusiastically recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean05

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Because of my ultrafine curly hair, and have made my own hair gels, and used mag sulfate.(1st ingredient aka/Epsom salts )Should have known. A pinch-1/2 teaspoon, used in gels, reinforces curl patterns. Too much= FRIZZY, VERY DRY, CAT HAIR..Thought the formulation might be a bit different, because of all the great reveiws. Used 2x's once w a very light leave in and nominal amount,from experience.. Turned hair very soft, flat not great curl pattern. Followed dirctions, to use generously 2nd time. Dry cat hair !.Complete dry,frizz,when scrunched, and complete loss of curl pattern. I normally have 3A ringlet style curl pattern. But baby fine. And on the porous side
customer_reviews.author: Michele by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly Surprised! I have very fine and very thin hair, and I highlight it on a regular basis. Just As the ad for Boldify Hair Thickening Spray stated...this product is very light weight, non-sticky, and it did immediately make my hair look and feel thicker. I was amazed. On top of that, it not only looks thicker, but also shiny, healthy, and more manageable. All of this after one application! With results like this, I’ll surely be back for more! Thank you Boldify!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: With a little practice, this product is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I don’t use it daily bc it will build up and make your hair stiff, but 1-3 days in a row is fine. I wash my hair each day and spray this on the roots after a towel dry- from the bottom layers of my hair (not directly on top layer roots). Then, I blow dry and style, but must be careful not to comb in the product too soon or it will get to the ends of my hair rather than stay in the roots- then I have big puffy ends! If done correctly, this provides the perfect extra volume... so using a little technique, this product does the trick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pchresha

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok. “Offer” inside box is not ok.
customer_reviews.text: It gave me some texture, wasn’t drying. Here’s why I’m giving it 3 stars. I have a problem with the insert that came in the box. It says on first purchase, you get a free bottle of Bodify. I went to the site and it was online education services,and discounted products from other manufacturers. Nothing anywhere about a free bottle. It was just a hook to get you to sign up for other things.. all require money to be spent. I just think this is an underhanded and a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Momo4

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine textured hair
customer_reviews.text: I read a review before I purchased this product that it did not work well for people with fine hair. I found that to be true! After spraying it on it does seem to have a volumizing effect but before the day is over it weighs fine textured hair down. It may work on some hair types but it did not work on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Used as directed and NOTHING
customer_reviews.text: I used it as directed and I might as well have sprayed water in my hair. Absolutely no difference in volume. I have thinning hair, but easily disguised. This couldn’t have been more disappointing. I’m shocked at he good reviews. I’ve always gotten some lift from volumizing products. Nothing with this. I only tried it because of the great reviews. Totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jeanius

customer_reviews.title: Fullness, Texture and Body!
customer_reviews.text: This thickening spray does exactly what I hoped. It gives my long hair fullness, texture, body, and prevents it from going flat and it doesn't dry my hair out or make it sticky like some products do. It's a great product and Boldify's customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Not too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I spray the product on wet hair and style. It is just the right stiffness to be able to still get your round brush through for styling. It has a pleasant smell. I tried the 4oz first. Now I ordered the 8oz and it winds up cheaper. I prefer a pump as aerosol gets wasted into the air. Most thickening products at hair salons are a gel, creme, aerosol...and MORE money. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: joobes

customer_reviews.title: it works for some people but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Well I wasn’t really sure how to answer the rating for volume control. I gave it one star. It does add volume but my hair feels awful. Usually my hair is soft and shiny but not after using the product. I have a long fine hair and I’m constantly in the search for a good volumizing product. This is not it. Obviously it works for some people but not for me. The only thing I can do with it is throw it in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I previously used the Adria volumizing spray until I ran out and found this. Voluminous products are essential to me, because my hair is super thin, and straight. It’s been a curse (I don’t care what you thick, curly haired girls say, haha!) if you have the same trouble/ this product is for you! My hair is in the best shape of its life!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrsten

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of some rave reviews on the product, and I'll say, for the price - it isn't bad. The product smells great. However... when I use it, and go to dry my hair, I have a really sticky feeling to it, and it tends to get tangled much faster once it's dry. I've tried using less of it to see if that would work, and I still have the same feeling. I've settled into just using it at my roots, and that seems to have helped. There's other products that I'd recommend over this one, but those are more expensive. For the price of this though, it's not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Bailosaur

customer_reviews.title: More like a "thinning will not hold your hairstyle" spray
customer_reviews.text: I love the thought of what this spray is supposed to do, but unfortunately it did not. My hair was real dry and crispy after. It would not take any heat at all, it would not respond to my straightener or my curling iron. I had such high hopes but unfortunately was let down. On the reviews everybody talked about the sent being so wonderful, it smelled like coconut meets menthol. For me personally, I did not enjoy the scent, but to each their own.
customer_reviews.author: Ally1280

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have fine, thin hair, medium length and this product was not messy and did not leave my hair with a film or gooie feeling. Was not tacky after I dried it either. A lot of products leave your hair feeling nasty after a thickening spray but this was nice. I did backcomb my hair for MORE volume but I do think the spray helped. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Verified account holder

customer_reviews.title: Makes your hair feel like sticky dry hay
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, makes your hair feel like crispy dry hay The only pleasant thing is it has a nice scent Would NOT recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jones

customer_reviews.title: I'm Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I wasn't expecting much when I bought this product. I have thin hair and my hairline has been receding as of recent, so I didn't think there was much hope. However after hours of looking at reviews and searching the web, I purchased this product. Let me tell you the first time I tried it and followed the instructions as directed, I saw a major differences. I'm not sure how, but this product made my thin hair look much more fuller and it added some volume/body to it. I followed that up with some smooth viking fiber hair cream and I'm looking like a new man to be honest!
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Scented Water
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and I tried this. I have super fine hair, she has super thick hair. Did absolutely nothing for either one of us. Might as well have been spraying scented water into our hair. Crazy. Definitely won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Reader2000

customer_reviews.title: More than just AWESOME VOLUME, shinny too!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a product that would add a youthful volume to my grey colored brown mousey hair. I read other reviews for “Boldify hair thickening spray” and decided to order it. I can’t tell you how pleased I am with the product. I feel as though it has taken 10 years off my looks. It’s light weight and acts almost as a hairspray. My hair is shinny and fewer fly aways. 100% satusfied. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: A real hairsaver!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have been losing a ton of hair since early April (and my hair is already very fine), once I started spraying the Boldify into my hair and working it through the roots before letting it dry, you couldn't even tell my hair has been thinning. And that's huge because I've had nightmares about my hair falling out since it began - it's very stressful! But with the Boldify spray my hair looks and feels like it has volume so I feel a sense of relief with it. I don't know exactly how the product works, but I definitely love it and plan to keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Odielicious

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have super thin (stereotypically Asian) hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have super thin (stereotypically Asian) hair and spraying this when my hair is damp really gives it some extra oomph. At that point, it actually holds curls better after curling it as well. Only neg is the kinda meh smell - it doesn't smell bad per se... just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works! - I’ll buy more!
customer_reviews.text: First time ever! Makes my hair look and feel thick! I normally blow my hair dry (for thickening) and curl. This pic I just sprayed and crunched with my hands and let it dry. Look like I have a ton of hair! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: works well on fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine hair and this product works great! I spray a little all over and then dry my hair and it holds its shape. I can also use the curling iron and it holds a curl really well. I like it a lot better than hair spray (although sometimes I also use hair spray on top). I dont feel like it is building up at all, it washes right out each time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth pagella

customer_reviews.title: Crack in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My hair has always been so limp and fine. I just started losing hair at my hairline by both temples due to an illness and was looking for options to help while it grew back. I stumbled across Boldify and the reviews encouraged me to give it a try. I’m so glad that I did! This thickening spray and the serum have added so much body and fullness to my hair. If this is what I can expect from the product, I’m thrilled. If I gain additional growth as well, I’ll be over the moon!
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: nice volume without being sticky.
customer_reviews.text: It really works well giving volume to my thin wavy hair. Love the fact that is not sticky at all and you cannot feel or see that you sprayed it. I apply it when my hair is almost dry, but not totally and that works for me so I can select better some spots where I need more volume. The only thing it does not smell that great, ..not bad, but wish had more the smell of Alterna Brand.
customer_reviews.author: mmcc

customer_reviews.title: Not for salon colored hair.
customer_reviews.text: The product does help with styling but it negatively altered the color of my hair. For the first time in 14 years, I returned to my stylist and complained about my color. The only change was that I started using this product. According to my stylist, there are ingredients in Boldify that are not recommended for salon colored hair. I'm going back to my old product. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy We

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! AMAZING product!! With thin ,sparse hair , usually volumizing/ texturing products more so leave my hair heavy and within a few hours , greasy. Not this !! Not sure which ingredient in this makes the difference but it gave me spectacular volume and texture . all I did was spray it on my damp hair after I washed it and just let it air dry. ( Normally I would have to use a blow dryer and try to maximize the products effects.) But this product totally did all the work on its own . Truly impressed and thrilled to have found this product For my hair
customer_reviews.author: hollygiguere

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably thicker
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product but decided to heed the rave reviews and I'm glad I did! I have naturally fine blonde hair and have always had a lot of it... until baby arrived. I experienced significant postpartum hair loss, so much so that I swear I lost half my hair volume in a matter of months. I've been feeling really self conscious and even chopped off a lot of length in hopes of achieving a healthier, fuller look. Long story short nothing has worked. While this product doesn't work miracles, it does give my hair a noticeably fuller look and feel. I actually spray it on after blow drying/styling and let it dry. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Not really effective..
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today...it left my hair sort of dry, feeling like it was coated with something and not really any difference in volume than other products I have used. A little disappointing, $22 for a 4 oz bottle....would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I guess this proves that just because this product works for some people, it can’t work for everyone. I have plenty of hair, it’s just absolutely baby fine. Even my hairdresser can’t get much volume. My hair is stubbornly flat and Boldify did nothing to change that. There was no miracle though I had my fingers crossed that I’d get something better. Oh well, back to Bumble and Bumble.
customer_reviews.author: RMG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and nature is taking its course with hair thinning being very annoying and worrisome. I have spent a lot of money trying numerous brands of shampoo, conditioners, gels, etc. while trying to get a less thin look. Nothing I tried up to now has worked. This stuff works! Miraculously, your hair looks thicker. I have sprayed my hair and then dried it. I have also sprayed it into my hair and let it air dry. Either way, it works. I think the product is pricy, but it doesn’t take a lot to make your hair look thicker. I would recommend it 100%! Also, I got a free bottle coupon in my order.
customer_reviews.author: Epal

customer_reviews.title: Does look fuller ;)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Boldify Spray on my towel dried hair for over 2 months now. The product makes my hair less limp and feels and looks fuller. When my hair air dries after spraying it kinda stays the way I comb it, and looks very natural like I don't have any product in my hair. Looks simply well groomed, not dull nor unnaturally shinny. Toward the end of the day, I add a little water on my hands and finger it thru... looks fresh as a daisy ;) again. I'm on my 2nd bottle already and absolutely love the product. It does look fuller for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jabarone

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good for 37yo male with naturally thin light brown, short (.5-2.5") hair
customer_reviews.text: 37yo male with naturally thin light brown, short (.5-2.5") hair. Your product does seem to add some bulk, not a huge amount but it's noticeable. I do like it but for the high price, it isn't quite worth it to me but my thin hair has always been hard to work with. I do like that your spray doesn't dry shiny or sticky and acts as kind of a dry shampoo in that it takes the greasy look out and keeps my hair from sticking together.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use too much, a few pumps is more than enough.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for some added volume. I have very thin, baby fine hair that is just wispy. I spray some on my damp hair shake and blow dry for a minute to give it a lift. Its not heavy and doesn’t feel sticky. Holds up for an entire work day. I don’t use it everyday- maybe 3 times a week. Definitely recommend if you’re looking to give hair some lift without overweighting.
customer_reviews.author: Aury

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought the larger bottle the first time!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After some trial and error, I found the right amount to use and I have been very pleased with Boldify. One application gives me two to three days of added volume. I was very nervous when my first bottle started to run out because I didn't know how long it would take to receive a replacement. I learned my lesson and ordered the larger bottle this time! ORIGINAL REVIEW: I haven't been using this spray for very long, but I do believe that it is adding volume to my hair. Based on my experience to date, I'm optimistic that it will continue to work well and perhaps even add more volume as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Day Trips LLC

customer_reviews.title: Finally a thickening spray that works without gumming up my baby fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I've tried thickening products that ended up making stiff clumps of my hair and actually caused breakage. This is a "dry" product in that when you spray it on towel-dried or damp hair, your hair doesn't get stuck together like gels and other spray liquids do. Really like the effect that my hair seemed to have more body and looked thicker. Shoulder length 50+ baby fine hair. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: It really works and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This spray actually does what it says. I find that my thin and fine hair looks a little thicker when I use it, plus it helps break up my really strong growth patterns/cowlicks. And gives a lot more volume that stays!! You do have to apply it when hair is damp- not wet and not dry- for it to work best. I also like that the next day I don’t need to spray more on; I just re-damp my hair and re-fluff it or blow dry it, and it’s like new again. I really like this so far. I don’t love the scent; it’s not bad though- fairly light. All in all, I’ll buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: loveshoesandshopping

customer_reviews.title: Good volumizing product (expensive but worth it)!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product because of the price (which is typically more than I spend on hair products), however I have really enjoyed using it so far. I have thin hair and have been experiencing hair loss due to a medication I am using, so I needed a product that would give me volume and life to my hair (to appear bigger) without flattening it or weighing it down. This product has definitely done that! The smell is fairly neutral and I'm not bothered by it at all. My only complaint is that when you spray it is very liquid and therefore drips/gets everywhere if you are not prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Jones

customer_reviews.title: love it. it does boldify was really skeptical
customer_reviews.text: love it. it does boldify was really skeptical, first time I applied it on my wet hair was a tad disappointed then read the bottle ( should've done that first time lol ) sprayed it on my freshly showered dry hair and it just does what it does, although during humid weather it just made my hair itch but that's it is still a why did i not know about this before product and anyone with like thin hair should give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great product to add volume to fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for adding extra body to fine, straight hair. My hair is relatively fine and doesn't do well with a lot of heavy, weighty product. A few spritzes of this product to the roots of my damp hair-- and a quick styling with the dryer (curling brush)-- adds texture and volume to my otherwise flat and limp hair. One bottle goes a long way. My last one lasted a few months, although I wasn't styling my hair every day. I was so satisfied with the product, I bought it again after I finished the last bottle. While the product does provide slight hold to the styling, it does not replace hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling product providing volume without heaviness or stickiness
customer_reviews.text: Boldify is a game changer for the fine-haired female who wants body and some thickness. Only takes a few sprays and the bottle lasts a long time. Boldify does not make your hair sticky or heavy, which is great as I wash my hair every third day. Also blends nicely when using dry shampoo the next day or the day after. No build up and doesn't strip your hair of color or dull your blonde -- complements well, which is perfect. Try it, I think you'll be pleased. I paid full price for this product and I'm on my second bottle. Feel free to email me with questions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Boldify is my holy grail hair product!
customer_reviews.text: My hair does *not* like hair products in general. My hair is straight and fine and super soft to the point where I can't even use conditioner, so I've always been on the hunt for a thickening spray that doesn't weigh down my hair and also doesn't make it oily. Boldify has honestly been a game changer for me. It's everything I've been looking for in a thickening spray and my hair loves it, which makes this product my holy grail. And I've noticed when I have Boldify in my hair, I can go an extra day without having to wash my hair and it still looks great. It's a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Really adds visible volume to your hair, really great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair on the top and front (hairline). I started using Bolidify and I have received several comments on how nice my hair looks. I don't know that they realize what the change is, so I tell them about this amazing product. It really does make the volume of your hair look and feel thicker. I have explained to my admirer's what has changed and they have also bought the product and love what it does for their hair also. I don't think there is much fragrance to this product, at least not that I can smell. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for real results.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Full but stiff
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair but a lot of it. I’m always looking for things to add volume. It did add fullness to my hair. It also made my hair very stiff, straw like. It felt kinda sticky. I thought maybe it was just a bad hair day. I tried one more time but same result. I want full hair but not straw full hair. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have very thin and baby fine hair, that has been unfortunatly shedding and thinning out even more due to medical related alopecia. So, I am always on the look out for products that can help me to feel better about my tresses. Boldify thickening spray does indeed add some "plumpness", and it smells absolutely heavenly. As long as you're not expecting miracles, then I would definitely recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Thicker
customer_reviews.text: Boldify Thickener works! I have short, thin, fine hair. Without product, it laid flat to my head or needed a ton of hairspray to give it some style. I can get great style, thickness, and styling ability with Boldify. I par it with the Dry Texture Spray, and my style will still look good in the morning. I will say that your hair will have a slightly "chalky" feel (similar to seat salt spray), but the results are worth it. I've tried many products over the years, but I'm sticking with Boldify!
customer_reviews.author: LAE

customer_reviews.title: Best hair thickening product on the market!  NOT KIDDING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I have tried everything to fix a flat spot on the side of my head where my hair just seems to be thinner. Everything I have tried has failed miserably, until I got my hands on Boldify. Let me say I am actually shocked at how well this works, I never expected these results. It doesn't make my hair feel weighted down, filmy, or gross like so many other products. I don't know how this works but it gives me full thick looking hair without compromising the texture. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandflea74

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Makes a noticeable difference. Not like someone can use this and go from very fine hair to thick, so don't expect that, but it does add a noticeable thickness and allows me to have more hairstyle options than I would have without it. Taking all factors into consideration for the rating, I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars only because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: However I must say that the results of using Boldify were amazing for me
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews for hair products. However I must say that the results of using Boldify were amazing for me. Not only did it thicken my hair noticeably, but my hair had body I would never have guessed it had. My hair sits just below the chin line and is in layers. My hair is thin and very fine and since using this product, I will never be without it with my results. Love, love, love it. Oh, and by the way, not greasy at all. Leaves no film on the hair. Wonderful product. No negatives in this review.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie OMalley

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks so full!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very thin and limp. I usually wear hair pieces when I wear my hair down to cover the thin areas and give the appearance of more hair. Since using Boldify Hair Thickening Spray along with the Boldify Hair Fibers my hair appears about twice as thick and I am able to wear it down without the hair piece. I am so pleased that I found this product and took a chance. I have used other thickening sprays in the past but none have worked. I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: STICKY
customer_reviews.text: Used this item today. NOT thrilled. Yes, my hair is thicker but it is , also, STICKY! Frankly, I can achieve that same thickness without the stickiness by adding/combing through dry hair hair-gel (any brand). Once the gel itself sets/dries and I brush my hair before styling, my hair looks and feels thicker without this overt stickiness. Purchased 2-bottles: will either return or drop in garbage. Sorry, but this is the truth of my experience. I am now going to rewash my hair to get this stickiness OUT!
customer_reviews.author: MaryLeah

customer_reviews.title: Great Body!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, thin and limp hair. Bought this product to give my hair body. When I first used it, it didn't seem to make a difference. However after re-reading the directions, I heavily applied Boldify, and my hair felt and looked much fuller after blowing dry. I have fairly short hair and it definitely made a big difference. Will continue to use it, since no other foams or gels have given me this much body.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Iraca

customer_reviews.title: Love Boldify
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very fine but lots of it, nonetheless my bangs are flat after wash & dry. If I apply product & blow dry so that my bangs are fluffy, have body, they go flat within a couple of hours. When I use Boldify after washing & before drying, my bangs hold onto the body from styling into the evening hours. The next morning I can do a quick brush & run out the door if required, without flat bangs. Boldify is my new & best hair product I’ve come across to date. I love Boldify
customer_reviews.author: LynnTresse

customer_reviews.title: Fly away hair
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this hair thickening spray. The first time I used it I got too much and it made my hair gummy. OK, that was operator error. After that I backed off and got a result I could work with. The problem is that I have very fine, baby type hair and this spray makes it full of static when I get it dried - you know the stand straight out from your head kind of static. That results in my having to use more hairspray just to style it. Sorry - not the product for my hair :(
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped for....
customer_reviews.text: Before my hair was very fine and limp. No body whatsoever. This product does add body to my hair, but seems to the price of making my hair be a terrible texture : very course and stiff and sticky. I guess If you're okay with that, then this product works. I personally am probably not a fan of my hair looking and feeling gummy. I also have to use it in conjunction with a dry shampoo because of the way it leaves my hair gummy and almost oily feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lama

customer_reviews.title: Gives my fine hair more body for longer time
customer_reviews.text: I have below shoulder length, fine blonde hair and have been using Bumble and Bumble Pre-Styler. It didn't seem to be giving me much body anymore so I tried Boldify Hair Thickening Spray and I'm glad I did. It is superior in hold, to say the least. I spray it into the roots after shampooing, then blow dry and it gives me a lot of body. My hair was going flat at the roots with Bumble but not with this! I'm also finding I can skip an additional day before I have to wash my hair again. I love it and totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: K Auclair

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t add any control or body to my hair! Looked previously open too!
customer_reviews.text: No idea how this product got such good reviews. My bottle arrived top had plastic but no seal like normal it looked like it was used. But for 30 bucks! Does nothing to my hair. I have thinning hair and added no hold or body.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight, nice hold
customer_reviews.text: I just cut my hair from below my shoulder blades to a long pixie cut. This makes my fine hair easy to style and it doesn't go flat. I am not a person who spends time styling my hair but this gives me a lot of easy options. It doesn't weigh down my hair, make it stiff, and looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: Yay, after trying literally dozens of products that say they will give your hair more volume, I've found one that really does! I have fine thinning hair. When I say fine, I mean baby fine. I've been getting perms, but you know how they damage. I'm needing a perm as the last one has grown out where it does nothing for the front of my head. Read the description for Boldify and the reviews and decided I'd try it and behold it gives my hairs enough body that my scalp doesn't show. I love it! thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my fine, thin hair.  Body without feeling dirty.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with Boldify. I was hesitant to try this because I haven't liked texturizing products in the past. They usually just made my fine, thin hair feel dirty, heavy, and dull. Boldify does not do that. My hair feels full and has body, but is still shiny and smooth. I am very happy with it. I still use some It's a 10 Leave in LITE for strength and heat protection with this and my hair is still not weighed down!
customer_reviews.author: dashnj

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Before using Boldify, I used this prestyling paste that really wasn’t the right product for my hair. I have fine hair and need something that will thicken my hair and give it a nice natural look and feel. This is exactly what Boldify does. I use about 5-7 Sprays on damp, almost dry hair and then blow dry and you can feel your hair thickening up as the heat from the blow dryer activates the product. Then when my hair is dry I take a very small amount of styling product and my hair stays in place all day. Using Boldify allows me to use less finishing product to make my hair exactly how I want it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Max Solo

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have always had very fine, limp hair,and recently suffered a lot of breakage. I purchased this product to try to make it look thicker at the root and add volume without heat. Boldify has made a huge difference in how thick and full my hair looks, I use it every day now! It has added a lot of volume and lift and my hair looks 10 times better than it did before.
customer_reviews.author: Moogly - Tamara Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have straight-flat hair! Even after a fresh wash/dry my hair is flat & looks like I've been napping on it. I have tried other volumizing sprays that work "okay" but not impressive enough to reorder! Other products left my hair feeling sticky or I couldnt stand the smell. BOLDIFY has been the best!! Smells pleasant & actually volumizes my hair without making it feel sticky!! Lasts all day, too!! Will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: JRMom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Works well for fine  hair.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely makes my hair feel thicker and it works very well with the spray-in styling aids use. My hair hasa normal feel when I use Boldiify. It definitely makes my hair feel thicker and it works very well with the spray-in styling aids I use. My hair has a normal feel when I use Boldiify.
customer_reviews.author: tlcmom3

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review Here - THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, I have pretty thick hair but it is also VERY fine so if I don't use the product it looks very thin and flat. This thickening spray 10000% works - Every time I wash my hair I put this product in my hair. Sometimes I just let it air dry and sometimes I will blow dry it and style it. Every single time my hair looks so full and stays that way all day long. I haven't been using dry shampoo as much as I used to, I used to use it every day now I use it maybe once-twice a week. I highly recommend trying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dana D'Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a product like this for a long time and was skeptical. It really works and gives you control. I started with a small bottle and ran through it and I am buying the large size now as a believer. Photo is from a photoshoot after using the product, you can see the control and added volume combined with other product to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Think thick
customer_reviews.text: I was using Aveda thickening spray but something in it was making me itchy and I suspect it was the gluten. Started looking for a gluten free hair thickening product and recently found Boldify. Totally love it! It gives a lot of thickness and volume to my fine, thin hair. Best results of any hair thickener I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: sak

customer_reviews.title: Would Never Buy This Product Again!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on bottle: "Spray generously on clean, slightly damp hair then work through fingers or comb. Let dry naturally or with a hair dryer on medium heat." My hair felt sticky, dirty and stiff. Dried with hair dryer. Tried again using much less product and allowed my hair to dry naturally. Same result. Gave bottle to my friend with warning details of my experience. She tried once and threw away. No, I do not recommend buying this expensive product. Still searching for product that works!
customer_reviews.author: D. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin fine hair and from the first time I used this it made my hair look and feel thicker. I am sold. It has a nice pleasant smell not at all overpowering. I hate stinky strong smelling products and this one smells so nice. I hope over time it helps with the overall health of my scalp and hair. Have not used it long enough to know yet but either way my hair feels great and thickert. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Packer Backer

customer_reviews.title: The best alternative or enhancer to mousse for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is below my shoulder and fine. I can't get the volume I want with mousse alone. So after I apply mouse on the top of my head, I spray Boldify all over, especially on lower layers and underneath. It helps to give me volume at the bottom of my hair - much better and more natural the mousse. Easier for a round brush when drying hair too. I haven't hit the humid weather yet, so I'm hoping it will hold up! Update: It does work in humidity! I can go a day or two now with having to wash my hair. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: A must for superfine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER fine hair and have searched all my life to find a Product that made it hard to see my scalp after styling. This is it. Boldify added tons of volume. Only drawback is that it makes my hair stiff. I added too much the first use and could not comb thru my hair to style it. The second day, I sprayed it on my fingers and only applies it to my roots. Much better results. I will continue to experiment but overall... I’m very pleased. Even my boyfriend noticed the difference!! Wow!!
customer_reviews.author: AimHigh67

customer_reviews.title: Works great for curls!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mid twenties male with noticeably thinning curly hair in the front and a receding hairline. Boldify has helped both fill in that thinning part to the point where it's not obvious but also helps make my hair look healthier and much curlier! My curls have never looked so beautiful and clumpy, and they stay in place throughout the day--no more frizz! For this reason alone I would use it, but filling in the thinning hairline has boosted my confidence too!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel James Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Boldify is a must have in my daily hair routine, I love it! I spray and comb it through my damp, towel-dried hair and then blowdry with a round brush. It leaves my hair nice and full of volume while keeping it soft and nicely textured. Before finding Boldify, I used different mousses and sea salt sprays, which tended to have a less natural appearance, and also dried my hair out. Thank you Boldify!
customer_reviews.author: SheedyTC11

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought Boldify on a whim based on all of the positive reviews on Amazon because I was tired of paying so much at the salon for products that never worked as well on my hair at home as they did at the salon. I couldn't believe how great Boldify was the first time I used it and I LOVE what it does to my hair. My hair is thicker, easier to style, and holds the style much longer and in all types of weather conditions without the use of additional products. It looks soft and feels great to the touch. I wish I would have discovered this product long ago, but am so happy to have it now!
customer_reviews.author: LWest

product_meta.title: BOLDIFY Hair Thickening Spray - Get Thicker Hair in 60 Seconds - Stylist Recommended Hair Thickener for Fine Hair - Hair Volumizer + Texture Spray for Hair Volume and Root Lift - 4 oz
feature_bullets: THICKER, MORE VOLUMINOUS HAIR IN 60 SECONDS! Apply lightly and evenly through damp hair then dry for enhanced thickness and instant volume. Sprays in easily, and gives a layered, textured finish and provides a light hold that looks great and lasts the entire day. Its a Hair Thickening Product for Women and Men

UNIQUE NON-STICKY FORMULA - Our super lightweight formula wont leave sticky residue or buildup like sea salt spray for hair can, which means it wont weigh down locks like other products! A hair Texturizing Spray + volume spray without the gunky residue, this thickening tonic + hair texturizer washes out cleanly & easily.

MADE RESPONSIBLY IN THE USA, RESULTS GUARANTEED - Boldify hair styling products are proudly made in the USA under GMP guidelines - WITHOUT harmful chemicals like Parabens - and NEVER tested on animals. You can rest assured you’ll see thicker hair and a fuller finish from this PURE, POTENT, SAFE hair thickener spray for men and women - or we’ll refund you the purchase price. NO questions asked, NO return required!

MAKES HAIR EASIER TO STYLE - Perfect for use as a pre-styler as it gives a light hold, natural definition and effortless finish, this volumizing spray + hair thickener is versatile enough to suit all hair types and lengths! Boldify, a premium hairspray for women and men, is the professional stylist's secret weapon for achieving great looking, easy to manage styles!

GREAT FOR YOUR HAIR - Packed with minerals and nutrients, our thickening tonic’s ability to absorb excess oil and moisture makes it one of the best volumizing products for healthy hair and a clean, happy scalp!
